  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111917</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111917</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Leteča preproga - pravljica</string>
            <string language="en">Flying carpet - fairy tale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fliegenteppich - fairy Geschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tapis de vol - conte de fées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tapete do vôo - tale fairy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Moquette di volo - racconto fairy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πετώντας τάπητας - ιστορία νεράιδων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alfombra del vuelo - cuento de hadas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec, ki potuje s preprogo, razvija domišljijske slike in jih opisuje tako, da so zanimive tudi za poslušalce. Ob vprašanjih sošolcev razvija zgodbo, ki ustreza tridelni zgradbi ( uvod – začetek potovanja, jedro – dogodki in doživetja, zaključek – vrnitev domov ). Igra je uporabna tudi za razredne ure - učence spoznavamo na drugačen način.</string>
            <string language="en">Simple game that needs imagination of participant to come up with a fairy tale that included flying carpet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">game</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pravljica</string>
            <string language="en">fairy tale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">motivacija</string>
            <string language="en">motivation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">domišljija</string>
            <string language="en">imagination</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfaches Spiel, das Phantasie des Teilnehmers 
benötigt, mit einer fairy Geschichte oben zu kommen, die 
Fliegenteppich enthielt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu simple qui a besoin de l'imagination du 
participant pour être soulevé avec un conte de fées qui a inclus le
tapis de vol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo simples que necessita a imaginação do 
participant vir acima com um tale fairy que inclua o tapete do vôo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco semplice che ha bisogno dell'immaginazione 
del partecipante di fornire un racconto fairy che ha incluso la 
moquette di volo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλό παιχνίδι που χρειάζεται τη φαντασία του 
συμμετέχοντος για να βρεί μια ιστορία νεράιδων που περιέλαβε τον 
πετώντας τάπητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juego simple que necesita la imaginación del 
participante venir para arriba con un cuento de hadas que incluyó la 
alfombra del vuelo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fairy Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beweggrund</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phantasie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conte de fées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">motivation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">imagination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tale fairy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">motivation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imaginação</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία νεράιδων</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φαντασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuento de hadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
